term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - spectral sensitivity, Sλ
term.title: spectral sensitivity

item.text: Referred to actinometers based on spectrophotometric measurements, S ac λ = Φ λ ɛ λ obs = sensitivi. Φ λ is the quantum yield of the actinometer at the excitation wavelength and λ obs is the observation wavelength, which may be the same as or differ from the former.

item.alttext: S ac λ = Φ λ ɛ λ obs = sensitivi
